headline: Natural resources industry committed to clean energy strategies despite growing investment in fossil fuels
summary: Willis publishes results from their 2025 Global Clean Energy SurveyLONDON, March 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Average spend across the natural resources industry on clean energy technologies is expected to increase by over a third in the next financial year, according to the latest global Clean Energy Survey released by Willis, a WTW business, (NASDAQ: WTW). Against the backdrop of increased fossil fuel investment in the short and medium term, natural resources businesses have ambitious long-ter
